Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students needing to talk to each other over a distance.
The student can illustrate a simple string telephone connecting the two students, showing how it works to send sound over distance.
The student can depict that the string telephone uses sound to communicate between the students.
The student can show the materials used in their drawing, such as cups and string, to represent the construction of the device.
The student can include elements that indicate how the string telephone solves the communication problem over a distance using sound.
